episodes.title: Cult Love-Bombing at Mica Miller's Former Church | #justiceformica
episodes.description:
For this episode, we're talking to a former member of Solid Rock Church at Market Common in Myrtle Beach, SC, Allicia Young, for the second time. In this discussion, we talk about the cult practice of love-bombing and the many ways Allicia and her husband experienced this tactic while attending Solid Rock church.

To learn more about Check My Church, visit our website at checkmychurch.org and subscribe to our social media pages on Facebook and Instagram to stay updated on all our current investigations and observations. 

https://www.facebook.com/checkmychurch
https://www.instagram.com/check_my_church/

#justiceformica #micamiller #jpmiller #solidrockchurch #christiancults #christianchurches #churchabuse #spiritualabuse
